title: Magic Bullet: Chip Upgrade! Salsa in a Snap
description: Making salsa has never been so easy! Enjoy these nutrient-rich ingredients in just a matter of seconds, perfect as an appetizer, dip, spread, or party platter. Get creative and customize this recipe! Roast the tomato and garlic before blending for an extra depth of flavor, stir in with fresh-cooked corn to turn this into a delicious corn salsa, or add more of your favorite ingredient, like onion or spicy jalapeño, to make your taste buds happy.

asset.author: Magic Bullet
asset.hookText:
Making salsa has never been so easy! Enjoy these nutrient-rich ingredients in just a matter of seconds, perfect as an appetizer, dip, spread, or party platter. Get creative and customize this recipe! Roast the tomato and garlic before blending for an extra depth of flavor, stir in with fresh-cooked corn to turn this into a delicious corn salsa, or add more of your favorite ingredient, like onion or spicy jalapeño, to make your taste buds happy.

For more information about MagicBullet, visit: https://www.getmagicbullet.com/

transcripts: I'm going to show you how to make easy, homemade, preservative free salsa that you can whip up in a jiff. We're going to add some cherry tomatoes, a little cilantro, onion, and a clove of garlic. Attach your cross blade and we're going to use the Magic Bullet pulsing technique. Now you have fresh salsa that you can take for lunch, or you can serve this at your next dinner party.
